title: Golden Circle Adventure

image.alt: Stunning view of Gullfoss waterfall, a major highlight of the Golden Circle route

quote.text: The Gullfoss waterfall was the most beautiful and powerful demonstration of the force of nature I've seen in my entire life.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

summary: A day exploring Iceland's famous Golden Circle route, featuring the historic Þingvellir National Park, active geysers at Geysir, the magnificent Gullfoss waterfall, and a rejuvenating hike to natural hot springs at Reykjadalur.

schedule.title: Breakfast at Hotel Fron
schedule.description: Enjoy an early breakfast at the hotel (included with your stay) to get a head start on the day.
